invest-intro.content-item-1: Want to find more sources of income but don't know where to start.
invest-intro.content-item-2: Want high profit with good price, limit risk.
invest-intro.content-item-3: Can't find a reputable investment place.
invest-intro.solution-ct1: Flexible short-term and long-term investment from only 10,000 VND. Ensure correct and full payment ability from the issuer.
invest-intro.solution-ct2: Connecting with more than 30 domestic and foreign credit institutions, providing diversified investment products with the best conditions.
invest-intro.solution-ct3: Select investment products guaranteed by large and reputable securities companies in the market.
invest-intro.fund-des: Safe investment, saving time from only 10,000 VND
invest-intro.bond-des: Bonds are issued by leading enterprises with large equity scale, sustainable cash flow from business to ensure solidity for bondholders.
invest-intro.deposit-des: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since
invest-intro.fund-content2: Diverse products to suit individual needs.
invest-intro.bond-content3: You can buy and sell 100% easily right on the FINA app.
invest-intro.deposit-content1: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry.
invest-intro.deposit-content2: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry.
invest-intro.deposit-content3: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry.
invest-intro.des-step-2: Enter the amount you want to invest
invest-intro.des-step-3: Enter OTP to confirm order success
invest-intro.ct-1-step-1: Access menu Products and programs at website fina.com.vn or on app FINA.
invest-intro.ct-2-step-1: Choose the right product to invest in.
invest-intro.ct-3-step-1: If the account is not authenticated, please verify the account EKYC to be able to trade with FINA.
invest-intro.ct-1-step-2: Easy to choose the desired amount of investment, the system will help you analyze the expected investment performance.
invest-intro.ct-1-step-3: After entering the amount, verify the OTP code sent to your phone number.
invest-intro.ct-2-step-3: The order will be confirmed successfully.
invest-intro.invest-title: 3 easy steps to invest with FINA
invest-intro.invest-options-title: Select investment products according to personal preferences
invest-intro.invest-options-des: FINA is a strategic partner with many reputable and safe investment sources, helping you to feel secure to invest effectively
invest-intro.options_destable: *Reference index: Average interest rate for 12-month term savings with interest payment at the end of the period of 4 state-owned commercial banks including Vietcombank, BIDV, Vietinbank, Agribank.
invest-intro.options_fund1: Excellent high expected return on long-term investment.
invest-intro.options_fund2: The fund is professionally managed by the Fund's Executive Board consisting of 2 investment experts and 15 experts in the analysis team.
invest-intro.options_fund3: Higher liquidity than other types of investment such as real estate, securities,...
invest-intro.options_fund4: Customer's money will be stored at the custodian bank of Standard Chartered Bank (Vietnam) Limited, so customers can feel secure about their investment.
invest-intro.invest-in-fina_subtit: Leave your information, FINA's expert team will contact you to advise you.
invest-intro.exper-invest_des: FINA provides safe and diversified investments with a team of professional advisors, promising to bring investors higher interest rates while limiting risks and profit optimization.
invest-intro.exper-invest_st1: Step 1: Download the FINA app at App Store or CH Play
invest-intro.exper-invest_st2: Step 2: Register an account by Email or phone number
invest-intro.exper-invest_st3: Step 3: Verify your account and experience invest with FINA

profile.notVerifiedDesc: Verify your account to protect your account, accumulate points and trade easily on FINA.
profile.captureFrontAndBack: Capture front and back of ID card/CCCD
profile.contractConfirmationDesc: When confirming the CTV contract signing, you will be entitled to benefits and commissions according to FINA's policy.
profile.minLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long
profile.includeLowercase: Password must contain lowercase (a-z) and uppercase (A-Z) letters
profile.includeNumber: Password must contain at least 1 number (0-9) or special symbol (!@#$%^&*)
profile.warning: Please enter your old password information to change your password
profile.noAsset: You haven't invested any assets yet
